collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (17 total Queries, 17 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Is there information about the client’s business including, for example:</p> <ul> <li>description of the nature of the business;</li> <li>details of the products or services sold;</li> <li>details of competitors;</li> <li>industry information (including: general trends, trade restrictions, government policies and grants etc.);</li> <li>key suppliers;</li> <li>key customers; </li> <li>locations; </li> <li>client’s risk assessment process, including consideration of business risks and how they are addressed <i>(this is a key ISA requirement)</i></li> <li>details of any plans for the future (including objectives and strategies of the business)?</li> </ul>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC3', '3', 'genmat', 'Active', '2024-04-08 19:44:32')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are there details of the regulatory environment, including the material laws and regulations affecting the business, and how requirements relating to the regulatory environment are addressed by the client?</p>', 'NO', 'None', 'AC3', '3', 'genmat', 'Active', '2024-04-08 19:44:32')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>If the client is part of a group, is there a diagram showing the group structure, and is the purpose of the group structure explained, including the reasons why any non-trading members of the group exist?</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC3', '3', 'genmat', 'Active', '2024-04-08 19:44:32')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are there details of any branches, associates and joint ventures (including: jointly controlled operation, jointly controlled assets and jointly controlled entities), and other key investments, including information on why they have been classified as such?</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC3', '3', 'genmat', 'Active', '2024-04-08 19:44:32')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Is there detail of the ultimate controlling party’s identity, including justification for this conclusion?</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC3', '3', 'genmat', 'Active', '2024-04-08 19:44:32')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have those charged with governance, and where separate, members of management been identified?</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC3', '3', 'genmat', 'Active', '2024-04-08 19:44:32')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are there details of all known related parties and the nature of the relationship (has this included reviewing relevant public registers)?</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC3', '3', 'genmat', 'Active', '2024-04-08 19:44:32')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are there details of how the client identifies related party relationships, transactions with related parties, and considers disclosure of transactions and balances in accordance with the financial reporting framework, including details of any controls?</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC3', '3', 'genmat', 'Active', '2024-04-08 19:44:32')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Is there information about the structure of the client’s business including an organization chart detailing key personnel and their roles?</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC3', '3', 'genmat', 'Active', '2024-04-08 19:44:32')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are there details of the accounting policies and estimation techniques applied (including revenue recognition) and explanation why they are considered to be appropriate to the client’s circumstances, where necessary? Where policies or estimation techniques have changed, has the reason for this been documented, and justified?</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC3', '3', 'genmat', 'Active', '2024-04-08 19:44:32')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are there details of any specific reporting requirements?</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC3', '3', 'genmat', 'Active', '2024-04-08 19:44:32')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are the names, addresses and contact details of the client’s professional advisers on file, including:</p> <ul> <li>bankers;</li> <li>legal advisors; and</li> <li>finance providers?</li> </ul>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC3', '3', 'genmat', 'Active', '2024-04-08 19:44:32')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are there details about the client’s pension scheme, including:</p> <ul> <li>the type of scheme operated;</li> <li>contributions required;</li> <li>a copy of the scheme rules; </li> <li>a copy of the trust deed; and </li> <li>details of constructive obligations?</li> </ul>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC3', '3', 'genmat', 'Active', '2024-04-08 19:44:32')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are there details of any share option schemes?</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC3', '3', 'genmat', 'Active', '2024-04-08 19:44:32')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are there details of hedging and where applicable, hedge accounting?</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC3', '3', 'genmat', 'Active', '2024-04-08 19:44:32')

post.question:
Array
(
    [0] => <p>Is there information about the client’s business including, for example:</p>
<ul>
    <li>description of the nature of the business;</li>
    <li>details of the products or services sold;</li>
    <li>details of competitors;</li>
    <li>industry information (including: general trends, trade restrictions, government policies and grants etc.);</li>
    <li>key suppliers;</li>
    <li>key customers; </li>
    <li>locations; </li>
    <li>client’s risk assessment process, including consideration of business risks and how they are addressed <i>(this is a key ISA requirement)</i></li>
    <li>details of any plans for the future (including objectives and strategies of the business)?</li>
</ul>
    [1] => <p>Are there details of the regulatory environment, including the material laws and regulations affecting the business, and how requirements relating to the regulatory environment are addressed by the client?</p>
    [2] => <p>If the client is part of a group, is there a diagram showing the group structure, and is the purpose of the group structure explained, including the reasons why any non-trading members of the group exist?</p>
    [3] => <p>Are there details of any branches, associates and joint ventures (including: jointly controlled operation, jointly controlled assets and jointly controlled entities), and other key investments, including information on why they have been classified as such?</p>
    [4] => <p>Is there detail of the ultimate controlling party’s identity, including justification for this conclusion?</p>
    [5] => <p>Have those charged with governance, and where separate, members of management been identified?</p>
    [6] => <p>Are there details of all known related parties and the nature of the relationship (has this included reviewing relevant public registers)?</p>
    [7] => <p>Are there details of how the client identifies related party relationships, transactions with related parties, and considers disclosure of transactions and balances in accordance with the financial reporting framework, including details of any controls?</p>
    [8] => <p>Is there information about the structure of the client’s business including an organization chart detailing key personnel and their roles?</p>
    [9] => <p>Are there details of the accounting policies and estimation techniques applied (including revenue recognition) and explanation why they are considered to be appropriate to the client’s circumstances, where necessary?  Where policies or estimation techniques have changed, has the reason for this been documented, and justified?</p>
    [10] => <p>Are there details of any specific reporting requirements?</p>
    [11] => <p>Are the names, addresses and contact details of the client’s professional advisers on file, including:</p>
<ul>
    <li>bankers;</li>
    <li>legal advisors; and</li>
    <li>finance providers?</li>
</ul>
    [12] => <p>Are there details about the client’s pension scheme, including:</p>
<ul>
    <li>the type of scheme operated;</li>
    <li>contributions required;</li>
    <li>a copy of the scheme rules; </li>
    <li>a copy of the trust deed; and </li>
    <li>details of constructive obligations?</li>
</ul>
    [13] => <p>Are there details of any share option schemes?</p>
    [14] => <p>Are there details of hedging and where applicable, hedge accounting?</p>
)
